bib.title: Love means never having to be careful: The relationship between reading romance novels and safe sex behavior
bib.author: Diekman, Amanda B and Gardner, Wendi L and McDonald, Mary
bib.abstract: Only romance novels set in the present day were included because we felt it would be  unrealistic to expect portrayals or discussions of condom use in historical romance novels.  A total of 86 romance novels were selected; 8 novels were excluded from codmg because
bib.publisher: SAGE Publications Sage CA: Los Angeles, CA
